Dialogues.Message: Bzzz, bzzzz, bzzzz, okay, I tired to portray the coffee machine that you need?

Choices.ChoiceMsg: Holy shit, the barrel is talking.

Dialogues.Message: What? Are you some kind of mechanical racist? I could have incinerated you with my lasers, if I had any.....
At least I can only burn you with hot coffee if you come closer, because I can't reach you.

Choices.ChoiceMsg: Calm down, do you need anything?

Dialogues.Message: Yes these annoying zombies constantly walk around me and scare away customers could you deal with them? And one more thing, destroy a few bottles of water, it's necessary to calm my circuits.

Choices.ChoiceMsg: It's weird, but okay, I'll do it.

Dialogues.Message: Great, I can pour you a couple of cups of coffee.

Choices.ChoiceMsg: What the hell is coffee? I need money!

Dialogues.Message: What money? Do you see any pockets on me? - no, so hold up your glass or get out of here while you're still alive.

QuestFinishDialogs.ChoiceMsg: We're done with the bottles and the zombies, what about the reward?
